GSD.description:
media: dvb-core: Fix UAF due to refcount races at releasing

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 3df07728abde249e2d3f47cf22f134cb4d4f5fb1. For more details please see the references link.
